name: Cytomine_VALIS_test_app
description: Cytomine App for VALIS that can register multiple images, and map annotations between them
command-line: CYTOMINE_HOST CYTOMINE_PUBLIC_KEY CYTOMINE_PRIVATE_KEY CYTOMINE_ID_PROJECT CYTOMINE_ID_SOFTWARE ALL_IMAGES IMAGE_CROP REFERENCE_IMAGE IMAGE_ORDERING ALIGN_TOWARD_REFERENCE REGISTRATION_TYPE COMPOSE_NON_RIGID ANNOTATION_TO_MAP IMAGES_TO_WARP CYTOMINE_UPLOAD_HOST MAP_ANNOTATIONS_TO_WARPED_IMAGES MAX_PROC_SIZE MICRO_MAX_PROC_SIZE

inputs.name: All Images
inputs.description: All Images that will be registered to or toward the reference image (may or may not include the reference image)

inputs.name: Cropping modes for all images [see info]
inputs.description: How to define the registration domain relative to all images. One of: 'reference' (defines the reference image as the domain), 'overlap' (means the common area only), 'all' (means the smallest area to include all images).

inputs.name: Reference Image
inputs.description: Reference Image. Taken from ALL_IMAGES if not given

inputs.name: Image ordering [see info]
inputs.description: How to order the images before doing the registration (useful for 3D registration). One of: 'auto' (default, meaning that the order doesn't matter), 'name' (to be ordered by filename), 'created' (to be ordered by addition date to Cytomine)

inputs.name: Align Toward Reference
inputs.description: Align images toward the reference, rather that directly to the reference. Meaningless if fewer than 3 images, see VALIS documentation for more info.

inputs.name: Registration Type [see info]
inputs.description: The type of registration performed by VALIS. One of 'rigid' (using affine transformations on lower resolution versions), 'non-rigid' (using non-rigid deformations on lower resolution version), 'micro' (using non-rigid deformations on higher resolution, tunable using MICRO_REG_MAX_DIM_PX).

inputs.name: Compose using non rigid deformation
inputs.description: See VALIS documentation for more info

inputs.name: Annotations to map
inputs.description: Annotations that should be mapped to the reference image after registration

inputs.name: Images to deform and upload
inputs.description: All Images that should be deformed to match the reference and uploaded to the same project. Must also specify CYTOMINE_UPLOAD_HOST if there are images to deform and upload.

inputs.name: Cytomine upload host
inputs.description: Cytomine upload host where the images should be uploaded to. Mandatory if there are images to deform and upload.

inputs.name: Map annotations to warped images
inputs.description: In addition to the reference image, also map annotation to the deformed and uploaded images

inputs.name: Maximum processing image size
inputs.description: Maximum dimension (in pixel) for any image on which image processing and feature extraction takes place. If None, Valis's default (850) is used

inputs.name: Maximum processing image size (micro)
inputs.description: Maximum dimension (in pixel) for any image on which image processing and feature extraction takes place for the micro registration. It is an error to specify this value if REGISTRATION_TYPE is not 'micro'. If None, Valis's default (3000) is used
